entry.title: AWS CodeBuild for macOS adds support for Fastlane
entry.summary: AWS CodeBuild now includes pre-installed Fastlane in macOS environments, streamlining mobile app development by providing built-in access to automated tools for code signing, testing, and app distribution, without manual setup requirements.

entry.title: Use generative AI on AWS for efficient clinical document analysis
entry.summary: In this post, we show how Clario uses the AWS platform to accelerate clinical document analysis.

entry.title: Does Trump’s Attempted “Dismantling” of Spook-Infested, Regime Change Agency USAID Herald a New Foreign Policy Era?
entry.summary: It looks more like an attempt to bring under control rogue agencies that were hostile to Trump during his first term in office as well as a shift in the type of “values” the US will support abroad.

entry.title: Enhancing Code Generation with Real-Time Execution in Amazon Q Developer
entry.summary: As AI continues to drive rapid innovation in software development, a reliable runtime environment for real-time testing is essential to promote high-quality code generation. Developers often face delays in feature delivery as they spend significant time debugging and iterating on AI-generated code to verify it meets project requirements.
